GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
KVM: nVMX: Snapshot pre-VM-Enter BNDCFGS for !nested_run_pending case

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 8f8aa303c4946f3ff9eadeb3e8b3fab657859672, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 62cf9bd8118c4009f02c477ef78c723f49e53e16. For more details please see the references link.
